name: Hovercraft: Getaway
description:
The #1 combat racing, custom vehicle building, totally addicting, action game of the year is back, and crazier than ever!

You’re on the run! Build your custom Hovercraft. Arm it to the teeth with machine guns, lasers, rockets, and mines. Then evade, attack, and survive as long as you can to make your Getaway!

FEATURES
* Build a completely custom Hovercraft and arm it with guns, lasers, missiles, mines and more!
* The Law is hot on your tail! Evade and obliterate advanced police cruisers, hoverbikes, armored trucks, aerial drones and even military tanks and attack helicopters!
* Cause enough destruction and the legendary Crimson Elite Force may even come after you!
* Equip up to 6 weapons simultaneously, and customize your loadout from thousands of possible combinations
* Long range sniper cannons? Tracking lasers? Triple fire homing rockets? Proximity homing mines? How about all of them, at the same time!
* Upgrade & Evolve your Hovercraft squadron and become even more powerful
* Endless upgrades! Collect & win tons of rare, epic, and legendary gear!
* Real-time damage models affect all of your Hovercraft's systems, from weapons to thrusters
* Experience insane physics-based combat racing, like nothing you've played before!

FOLLOW US
